required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Tear Evaporation Rate With DAILIES TOTAL1 and Biotrue ONEday
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Tear Evaporation Rate With DAILIES TOTAL1 and Biotrue ONEday

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this pilot study is to compare the effect of DAILIES TOTAL1, a low water content silicone hydrogel lens, and Biotrue ONEday, a high water content hydrogel lens, on the rate of tear evaporation. The study will also serve to validate the novel, in-house developed evaporimeter.

study_design_info.masking_description: Participants and investigators are masked as to which lens is assigned to each eye.

primary_outcome.measure: Tear Evaporation Rate With Nesofilcon A
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 15 minutes post-contact lens, 6 hours post-contact lens
primary_outcome.description: Tear film evaporation rate (% relative humidity per second) was performed using a novel evaporimeter as a non-invasive measurement of tear film evaporation. The slope was calculated from the change in humidity between 7 to 17.5 seconds while the eye was open and between 10 to 17.5 seconds when the eye was closed. Data from the both eyes were analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Tear Evaporation Rate With Delefilcon A
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 15 minutes post-contact lens, 6 hours post-contact lens
primary_outcome.description: Tear film evaporation rate (% relative humidity per second) was performed using a novel evaporimeter as a non-invasive measurement of tear film evaporation. The slope was calculated from the change in humidity between 7 to 17.5 seconds while the eye was open and between 10 to 17.5 seconds when the eye was closed. Data from the both eyes were analyzed.

arm_group.description: Nesofilcon A was worn in right eye and delefilcon A worn in the left eye.
Delefilcon A was worn in right eye and Nesofilcon A worn in the left eye.

intervention.description: Hydrogel contact lens for daily wear
Silicone hydrogel contact lens for daily wear

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

group.title: Nesofilcon A/Delefilcon A
group.description: Nesofilcon A randomly assigned to one eye with delefilcon A in the fellow eye. Nesofilcon A: Hydrogel contact lens for daily wear

group.title: Delefilcon A/Nesofilcon A
group.description: Delefilcon A randomly assigned to one eye with nesofilcon A in the fellow eye. Delefilcon A: Silicone hydrogel contact lens for daily wear

measure.title: Race and Ethnicity Not Collected
measure.population: Race and Ethnicity were not collected from any participant.

outcome.title: Tear Evaporation Rate With Nesofilcon A
outcome.description: Tear film evaporation rate (% relative humidity per second) was performed using a novel evaporimeter as a non-invasive measurement of tear film evaporation. The slope was calculated from the change in humidity between 7 to 17.5 seconds while the eye was open and between 10 to 17.5 seconds when the eye was closed. Data from the both eyes were analyzed.
outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 15 minutes post-contact lens, 6 hours post-contact lens

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
